label: A2BC3_hP24_190_bh_f_i-001
title: Er$_{2}$RhSi$_{3}$ Structure
comments: (Gladyshevskii, 1992) put Er$_{2}$RhSi$_{3}$ in the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C2_hP24_194_f_k_bh-001}{Lu$_{2}$CoGa$_{3}$ structure} and report that there is little difference between the two forms, however we find significant differences and the ICSD lists the two structures as different varients of Er$_{2}$RhSi$_{3}$.  We will list the two structures under Er$_{2}$RhSi$_{3}$ (space group $P\overline{6}2c$ \#190) and Lu$_{2}$CoGa$_{3}$ (space group $P6_{3}/mmc$ \#194).  The two space groups differ only in that the later group contains the inversion operator.
